description: Grants the user's body the properties of rubber, allowing them to stretch and become immune to blunt attacks and electricity.

users.circumstances: Luffy accidentally ate the fruit as a child

abilityReveals.description: Luffy's Gear Second Jet Pistol enhanced with Busoshoku Haki, combining stretching power with armament for devastating effect.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Luffy uses it against Hody Jones during their underwater battle, sending him flying with enhanced power.

weaknesses.weakness: Inability to swim - Devil Fruit user drowns in water
weaknesses.context: Luffy nearly drowns when Hody destroys the air bubble, requiring Fukaboshi's rescue

description: Allows the user to mark someone as a target by touching them with their bare hand. Any object thrown with that same hand will lock onto and chase the target until it hits them or is stopped by an obstacle.

users.circumstances: Vander Decken IX ate this fruit at some point before the series

weaknesses.weakness: Effects nullified if user falls unconscious
weaknesses.context: Vander Decken IX is unconscious, but Noah continues falling because it was already thrown before he lost consciousness
